metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian2 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette: a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This civilian is named Ooltheg.
metadata.how_to_trigger: talk to the civilian2 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

0.speaker: Ooltheg
0.text: Beautiful! What colours. Reminds me of the sparkler tricks on Liar's Night!
